name: Idempotent removal - repeating the operation
description:
To protect data consistency and the user experience,
  the system should clearly communicate errors and block invalid operations.
descriptionHtml:
To protect data consistency and the user experience,
the system should clearly communicate errors and block invalid operations.
statusMessage:
[HTTP status] 
Expecting actual:
  200
to be in:
  [404, 400, 204]
statusTrace:

to be in:

steps.name: Given I have valid permissions to manage the bookstore
Given a book exists in the bookstore

parameters.name: book
parameters.value: Book[id=1793315516, title=Tirra Lirra by the River, description=Tempora ad consequatur., pageCount=102, excerpt=Nihil repellat inventore odio. Aperiam earum quod explicabo cum dolore ratione sapiente. Autem molestias expedita impedit iure., publishDate=2025-09-21T06:08:59.775521275Z]

steps.name: And I have removed that book from the bookstore
When I attempt to remove the same book again
Then the system informs me the book item is already unavailable and no further changes are made
